resources.string:
Cadpage Paging Service is now supported!!!
 See http://www.cadpage.org/paging-service
 
 Added some additional notification options to add more flexibilty, and to give users some ways to avoid the problem where the text messsage alert sound overrides the Cadpage alert sound.
 
 New Locations:
 Wayne County, IN (alt)
 Franklin County, NY
 Portage County, OH
 Roane County, TN
 Kilgore, TX
 Preston County, WV
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 Jefferson County, AL
 Sacreamento County, CA
 San Bernardino, CA
 Jefferson County, CO
 Weld County, CO
 Litchfield County, CT
 Montgomery County, MD
 Chautauqua County, NY
 Alamance County, NC
 Durham County, NC
 Hamilton County, OH
 Licking County, OH
 Williamson County, TX
 
 General fixes:
 Crash on receiving garbled data from authorization server
